Risk.英文名称: Racial Bias in Image Reconstruction Risk
Risk.来源: An AI tool which reconstructed a pixelated picture of Barack Obama to look like a white man perfectly illustrates racial bias in algorithms

AITechnique.来源: Turns Out There’s A Tool That Brings Back Sharpness Of Low-Res Photos And Some Results Are A Bit Creepy
